type Component = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IComponent interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供 接口的基实现并启用应用程序之间的对象共享。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for the interface and enables object sharing between applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由引用封送是公共语言运行时中的所有组件的基类。 is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference. 是可远程处理和派生自类。 is remotable and derives from the class. 提供的实现接口。 provides an implementation of the interface. 提供的实现，将按值封送。The provides an implementation of that marshals by value. 你可以托管中实现的任何对象接口，并且您可以查询和获取从其容器的服务。You can host a in any object that implements the interface, and you can query and get services from its container. 创建容器次数为每个它包含。The container creates an for each it contains. 容器使用的站点来管理，并由与其容器进行通信。The container uses the site to manage the and is used by the to communicate with its container. 一个应通过调用显式释放资源及其方法，而无需等待自动内存管理通过隐式调用方法。A should release resources explicitly by calls to its method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the method. 当将被释放中的所有组件还释放。When a is disposed, all components within the are also disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRaiseEvents As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool CanRaiseEvents { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示组件是否可以引发事件的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.

value.span: 如果组件可以引发事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component can raise events; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认实现始终返回`true`。The default implementation of this property always returns `true`. 继承的类类应重写此属性提供的功能，若要禁用事件的引发。Classes that inherit from the class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events. 例如，在类中，如果控件承载 ActiveX 控件，作为属性返回`false`如果 ActiveX 控件具有冻结其事件。For example, in the class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.

para.span: 如果重写此方法在派生类中的并将其更改为返回，则返回的集合属性返回的事件。

span.span: If you override this method in a deriving class and change it to return , the collection returned by the property returns for an event.

para.span: 事件仍可以添加和从集合中，但该集合中删除属性将始终返回。

span.span: Events can still be added and removed from the collection, but the collection's property will always return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在容器中的组件中先入先出列表，它还定义在容器内的组件的顺序进行跟踪。The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container. 添加的最后一个组件是在列表中的最后一个组件。The last component added is the last component in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中存储的设计模式指示器; 因此，如果不具有与之关联，此属性的值是`false`。The design mode indicator is stored in the ; therefore, if the does not have an associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示释放托管资源和非托管资源； 表示仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Disposed As EventHandler

summary.span: 当通过调用 方法释放组件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 委托时，请标识将处理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about the event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在通过垃圾回收将 回收之前，释放非托管资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))，[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个将具有如果已添加到并分配到它。A will have an if it has been added to an and the assigns an to it. 负责将分配到。The is responsible for assigning the to the . 更改组件的值不一定是不更改站点的名称分配给。Changing the value of the component's does not necessarily change the name of the site the is assigned to. 属性应设置仅可由。The property should be set only by an . 属性值是`null`如果已从其。The property value is `null` if the is removed from its . 将分配`null`到此属性不一定会删除从。Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the from the . 一个可能或可能不具有一个名称。A might or might not have a name. 如果是指定一个名称，名称必须是唯一的而其他中的对象及其。If a is given a name, the name must be unique among other objects within its . 存储的名称; 因此，仅可以命名如果它具有与之关联。The stores the name of the ; therefore, you can only name a if it has an associated with it.
